com.github.rholder.moar.concurrent.thread

Class MXBeanThreadProfiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rholder.moar.concurrent.thread.MXBeanThreadProfiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreadProfiler

    public class MXBeanThreadProfiler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThreadProfiler
    Use the ThreadMXBean implementation to provide thread information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MXBeanThreadProfiler()
      ThreadContentionMonitoring and ThreadCpuTime are both turned on when constructing this class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getThreadCpuTime(long threadId)
      Return the number of nanoseconds of CPU time used by the thread with the given id.
      long getThreadWaitTime(long threadId)
      Return the number of nanoseconds of waiting time used by the thread with the given id.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MXBeanThreadProfiler

        public MXBeanThreadProfiler()
        ThreadContentionMonitoring and ThreadCpuTime are both turned on when constructing this class. See ThreadMXBean for more details.

    • Method Detail

      • getThreadWaitTime

        public long getThreadWaitTime(long threadId)
        Description copied from interface: ThreadProfiler
        Return the number of nanoseconds of waiting time used by the thread with the given id. The difference of successive calls to this method should result in the wait time used by the thread
        Specified by:
        getThreadWaitTime in interface ThreadProfiler
        Parameters:
        threadId - id of the target thread

      • getThreadCpuTime

        public long getThreadCpuTime(long threadId)
        Description copied from interface: ThreadProfiler
        Return the number of nanoseconds of CPU time used by the thread with the given id. The difference of successive calls to this method should result the CPU time used by the thread
        Specified by:
        getThreadCpuTime in interface ThreadProfiler
        Parameters:
        threadId - id of the target thread
